# Food Services National Training Academy, Kingston ON

## Solicitation Number
21120-239940/A

## Tender Description
The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is issuing a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of food services to the Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) training facility cafeteria located at 443 Union Street, Kingston, Ontario.

## Scope of Work
The successful bidder will be required to provide food services to CSC recruits from February 1, 2023, to January 31, 2026, with an optional one-year extension. The services will be provided in accordance with the Contract Security Program requirements and will include personnel and organization security screening.

## Documents
Bidders are required to use the CPC Connect service provided by Canada Post Corporation to transmit their bid electronically. The tender documents can be accessed at the following link: [Link](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/63e51b38cf2c72c8279a9bb53f305ab9/ABES.PROD.PW_KIN.B519.E8687.EBSU000.PDF).

## Procurement Method
The procurement method is competitive and open to all interested suppliers. The lowest price will be the determinant factor in the selection process.

## Security Requirements
The successful bidder will be required to comply with the Contract Security Program requirements, which include personnel and organization security screening. For more information on security requirements, please consult Part 6 of the tender documents.

## Bidder's Conference and Site Visit
An optional bidder's conference and site visit are scheduled.
